FILE: cm230732v11.0.txt
DYAD: SPAIN-S. KOREA

PSNOTES: 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20171220
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20171224


Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables


MID4459 

TERRMID: MID4459 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4459 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID4459 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4459 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4459 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4459 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID4459 from cm narrative, Spain seized a South Korean weapons shipment to Senegal. South Korea protested and claimed that it was a legal shipment, while the Spanish countered that the weapons were being transported with false documentation. Coded not maritime because no boundary was being disputed. 

ISLMID: MID4459 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4459 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4459 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4459 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4459 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4459 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES:

COUPMID-CER: MID4459 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4459 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4459 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 


MID4 2002-2010:

MID4459
rivalry=230732 nationa=SPAIN nationb=S. KOREA MID4459 20030701-20030704 
 revtype1a=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Spain seized a South Korean weapons shipment to Senegal. South Korea protested and claimed that it was a legal shipment, while the Spanish countered that the weapons were being transported with false documentation. It is unclear when, or if, the weapons were released. First day of dispute was on 7/1/2003 and last day of dispute was on 7/4/2003.
